name: FEED CREED
description:
Welcome to Cog's World. You'll never leave now.

FEED CREED is a small game where you play the role of Dave Davidson one of the founding team members that helped built the Cog World from the ground up with their creation "Creed".

Davidson receives a letter from an old friend in the factory who is known as Mr J. While the player isn't aware of the relationship, Davidson trusts Mr J, and the game begins just as we get the letter. Explore the factory and find many of its secrets and some of the hidden stories of what's been going on. 

Feedback is very important at this time, and will heavily shape the future of this project so please, feel free to add any comments you have below. We will be releasing new builds when they are ready. 

YouTube & Twitch;

If you are looking to create content for this game, please do and use the #FeedCreedGame ! And share it below we will be collecting some influencers to help us on the continued development. 

Please note this game is STILL in development.
